ecommerce.title:
Custom eCommerce
Development Services
ecommerce.paragraph: In the constantly growing and highly competitive industry of eCommerce every page, every metric, and every user’s opinion plays a huge role. We’re ready to transform your design layouts into well performing web site, that will boost your sales.
ecommerce.imgAlt: Illustration with two figures of people, a man conveys something to a girl

fintech.title:
Fintech and Banking
Web Development
fintech.paragraph: The financial industry is expanding its digital presence, moving more and more services online to meet rising consumer demand. With this transition comes a growing need for higher digital security standards. Find out how we can help.

informationTechnology.title:
Web Development Services
for IT Companies
informationTechnology.paragraph: The IT industry is always on the cutting edge of technological progress. The effort to adapt to new technologies as quickly as possible is not only a desire but also the key to success in this industry. We help these companies become market leaders.

mediaAndMarketing.title:
Custom Development
for Media-Related Companies
mediaAndMarketing.paragraph: Throughout history, entertainment has been intertwined with culture, so it’s unsurprising that it has a vast presence on the web. We’ve helped many media companies grow and evolve. Reach out to us to find out how we can help you.

facts.heading: Development With a Personal Approach
facts.subHeading: Regardless of the size or duration of your project, we provide personalized services and flexible terms.

coreValues.heading: Core Values
coreValues.subHeading: We maintain the highest standards of web development and apply best practices to each project.

firstItem.title: Accessibility
firstItem.text: Did you know that up to 20% of all users have special needs when using the Internet? We care. You can be sure that everybody will have an equal access to your product.

secondItem.title: Web Security
secondItem.text: One incorrectly implemented authorization or payment form can lead to hacking and extraction of user or company data. From the very beginning, we think very carefully about the code architecture and pay special attention to this issue.

thirdItem.title: UX
thirdItem.text: We understand how important little things in design are, and we can do pixel-perfect development. But we never forget about user-friendliness. Developing your designs we are basically the first users of your product and we pay a lot of attention to the UX details that can seriously affect the users’ opinion. Perfectionism must be smart.

projects.heading: Our projects
projects.subHeading: This is the true stories. The events described here took place in CSSSR in 20XX. At the request of the clients, all names and important details have been hidden. Out of respect for the team, the rest has been told exactly as it occurred

firstItem.heading: Telecom Provider
firstItem.text: Website for the largest fashion department store in Eastern Europe.

secondItem.heading: Telecom Provider
secondItem.text: Online storefront for wine importer and distributor

thirdItem.heading: Telecom Provider
thirdItem.text: Interface of self service terminal system for one of the largest Russian online electronics retailers

form.title: Let’s Talk
form.subTitle: please provide your contact details and we will respond shortly
